alert.note: Alert for Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:58PM CDT until April 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Columbia. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Low areas along the river are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday morning to a crest of 18.0 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Columbia 17.0 15.2 Thu 8 pm CDT 16.3 17.6 18.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
